statements: SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE endangered_status = 'Critically Endangered'
SELECT species_name FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE endangered_status = 'Endangered'
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE population_size < 500
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE endangered_status = 'Critically Endangered' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE population_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY population_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE species_name LIKE 'T%' OR endangered_status LIKE '%Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpeciesPopulation WHERE endangered_status IN ('Endangered', 'Critically Endangered') ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE species_id = 3 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM species WHERE population_size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM ConservationOrganizations;
SELECT organization_name, address FROM ConservationOrganizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE habitat_description LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT organization_name, population_size FROM ConservationOrganizations JOIN PopulationTracking ON ConservationOrganizations.organization_id = PopulationTracking.organization_id;
SELECT tracking_id, tracking_date FROM PopulationTracking ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationOrganizations WHERE address IS NOT NULL LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_id, species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT organization_name, contact_person, address FROM ConservationOrganizations WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat_description FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE habitat_description LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY species_id ASC;

SELECT organization_id, organization_name, COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM ConservationOrganizations JOIN PopulationTracking ON ConservationOrganizations.organization_id = PopulationTracking.organization_id GROUP BY organization_id, organization_name ORDER BY total_species DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM endangered_species WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM conservation_teams WHERE team_name = 'Conservation Team 1';
SELECT observation_date FROM observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count < 500 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, location FROM endangered_species WHERE location = 'Africa' AND population_count > 5000;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM conservation_teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY team_lead;
SELECT species_name, population_count, location FROM endangered_species WHERE location <> 'North America' AND population_count < 10000;
SELECT observation_date, habitat_type FROM observations JOIN habitats ON observations.species_id = habitats.habitat_id ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';

SELECT species_name, location, habitat_type FROM endangered_species JOIN species_habitat ON endangered_species.species_id = species_habitat.species_id JOIN conservation_areas ON species_habitat.area_id = conservation_areas.area_id;
SELECT area_name, location, habitat_type FROM conservation_areas;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;

SELECT species_name, location, habitat_type FROM endangered_species JOIN species_habitat ON endangered_species.species_id = species_habitat.species_id JOIN conservation_areas ON species_habitat.area_id = conservation_areas.area_id WHERE conservation_areas.location='Amazon';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(population) AS max_population, MIN(population) AS min_population FROM population_data WHERE species_id = 1;
